name: Coin Tales
description:
Welcome to Coin Tales-A Blast of a Social Game!
Spin and win the jackpot extremely easy. Go attack or raid, go steal to get coins with dragon. Join your Facebook friends and players around the world! Spin to be the master of tales!

Enjoy these features:
Spin to earn coins: Spin the wheel to earn coins! Spin to be the master of tales!
Attack and Raid Friends: Attack or raid friends and foes to save enough loot to build your village.
Dragon fight for you: Hatch eggs and raise dragon, let it fight for you!
Tournaments: Join the fierce competition to fight for the final rewards!
Card Collection: Representative objects for every album, finish the set exchange big rewards!
Festival Event: Special Events and prizes for different festivals.



Gameplay:
Spin the wheel to earn coins and build your village. Do not want to spin...? You can steal with your dragon. Invite your friend from Facebook, play with them, and win rewards.

Follow Coin Tales on Facebook for daily free offers and bonuses!
Coin Tales is a free game on all devices with in-app purchases.

Coin Tales does not offer real money gambling. It is intended for an adult audience for entertainment purposes only.
